title: Sampler, October 25, 1741
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in satin, cross, eyelet, Roumanian, stem, long armed cross, herring bone, rococo, double running and detached looping stitches on plain weave foundation
inscribed: Elizabeth Silk her work ended in the thirteenth year of her age October the 25 1741
description: Vertical rectangle with bands of pattern, alphabet, numeral and singnature "Elizabeth Silk her work ended in the thirteenth year of her age October the 25 1741."

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, October 25, 1741.
October 25, 1741. Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in satin, cross, eyelet, Roumanian, stem, long armed cross, herring bone, rococo, double running and detached looping stitches on plain weave foundation. Bequest of Gertrude M. Oppenheimer. 1981-28-84.
